alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 26 at 2:15PM PDT until March 28 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MONDAY TO 11 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Marin Coastal Range and Coastal North Bay, Including Point Reyes National Seashore. * WHEN...From 11 PM Monday to 11 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected for the Marin coastline as well as high elevations of the Marin coastal mountain range. Wind gusts between 30 to 40 mph are expected with localized areas of higher terrain greater than 45 mph.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range
